docs.text: CLI Reference This page provides documentation for our command line tools. runbook Usage: runbook [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --cwd PATH Directory for operations (normally at root above runbooks, ie ../.runbook.yaml) and can be set with RUNBOOK_WORKING_DIR or WORKING_DIR environment variables --help Show this message and exit. check Check language validity and formatting of a notebook. Usage: runbook check [OPTIONS] FILENAME Options: -c, --command TEXT Run a notebook through this custom command, ie 'deno check {}' where the {} is the temporary filename. --help Show this message and exit. convert Convert an existing runbook to different format Usage: runbook convert [OPTIONS] FILENAME OUTPUT Options: --help Show this message and exit. create Create a new runbook from [template] Usage: runbook create [OPTIONS] FILENAME Options: -t, --template PATH -l, --language TEXT --help Show this message and exit. diff Diff two notebooks Usage: runbook diff [OPTIONS] NOTEBOOK_1 NOTEBOOK_2 Options: --help Show this message and exit. edit Edit an existing runbook Usage: runbook edit [OPTIONS] FILENAME Options: --help Show this message and exit. init Initialize a folder as a runbook repository Usage: runbook init [OPTIONS] Options: -d, --directory PATH -s, --skip-confirmation BOOLEAN --help Show this message and exit. list list runbooks Usage: runbook list [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit. plan Prepares the runbook for execution by injecting parameters. Doesn't run runbook. Usage: runbook plan [OPTIONS] INPUT Options: -e, --embed PATH -p, --params TEXT -i, --identifier TEXT --help Show this message and exit. review [Unimplemented] Entrypoint for reviewing runbook Usage: runbook review [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit. run Run a notebook Usage: runbook run [OPTIONS] FILENAME Options: --output PATH --interactive / --no-interactive Run the notebook in interactive mode or EXPERIMENTAL non-interactive mode --help Show this message and exit. show Show runbook parameters and metadata Usage: runbook show [OPTIONS] RUNBOOK Options: --help Show this message and exit. version Display version information about runbook Usage: runbook version [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: CLI Reference

docs.text: This page provides documentation for our command line tools.
docs.title: CLI Reference

docs.text: Usage: runbook [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --cwd PATH Directory for operations (normally at root above runbooks, ie ../.runbook.yaml) and can be set with RUNBOOK_WORKING_DIR or WORKING_DIR environment variables --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: runbook

docs.text: Check language validity and formatting of a notebook. Usage: runbook check [OPTIONS] FILENAME Options: -c, --command TEXT Run a notebook through this custom command, ie 'deno check {}' where the {} is the temporary filename. --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: check

docs.text: Convert an existing runbook to different format Usage: runbook convert [OPTIONS] FILENAME OUTPUT Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: convert

docs.text: Create a new runbook from [template] Usage: runbook create [OPTIONS] FILENAME Options: -t, --template PATH -l, --language TEXT --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: create

docs.text: Diff two notebooks Usage: runbook diff [OPTIONS] NOTEBOOK_1 NOTEBOOK_2 Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: diff

docs.text: Edit an existing runbook Usage: runbook edit [OPTIONS] FILENAME Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: edit

docs.text: Initialize a folder as a runbook repository Usage: runbook init [OPTIONS] Options: -d, --directory PATH -s, --skip-confirmation BOOLEAN --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: init

docs.text: list runbooks Usage: runbook list [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: list

docs.text: Prepares the runbook for execution by injecting parameters. Doesn't run runbook. Usage: runbook plan [OPTIONS] INPUT Options: -e, --embed PATH -p, --params TEXT -i, --identifier TEXT --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: plan

docs.text: [Unimplemented] Entrypoint for reviewing runbook Usage: runbook review [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: review

docs.text: Run a notebook Usage: runbook run [OPTIONS] FILENAME Options: --output PATH --interactive / --no-interactive Run the notebook in interactive mode or EXPERIMENTAL non-interactive mode --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: run

docs.text: Show runbook parameters and metadata Usage: runbook show [OPTIONS] RUNBOOK Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: show

docs.text: Display version information about runbook Usage: runbook version [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: version
